monitor: 2.7″ Inch, approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD, and 5-level brightness adjustment
isosensitivity: ISO 80-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
power: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-62G (available separately)
sensor: 1/2.3-in. type CCD; approx. 16.44 million total pixels
